feed.title: Writing a JavaScript Compiler in Rust Blog
feed.subtitle: Writing a JavaScript Compiler in Rust Blog

entry.title: The ECMAScript Specification
entry.summary: The ECMAScript® 2023 Language Specification details everything about the JavaScript language, so anyone can implement their own JavaScript engine.
entry.content:
The ECMAScript® 2023 Language Specification details everything about the JavaScript language, so anyone can implement their own JavaScript engine.

For a compiler, we will study the following chapters:

    1. Notational Conventions
    1. ECMAScript Language: Source Text
    1. ECMAScript Language: Lexical Grammar
  • 13 - 16 Expressions, Statments, Functions, Classes, Scripts and Modules
  • B Additional ECMAScript Features for Web Browsers
  • C The Strict Mode of ECMAScript
